attributes.action: make any petition with over a million signatures subject to a nationwide referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the outdated, elitist, and undemocratic nature of the UK constitution. Changes should be made that emulate the success of participatory democracy in switzerland. I.E through a system that allows any citizen to initiate a referendum by obtaining over a  million signatures to a petition.
